member.name: M:Excer1.Startup.ConfigureServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: The AllowAnyOrigin could be replaced with WithOrigins which takes a string (or string array) of allowed domains to call our services. The AllowAnyMethod could be replaced with WithMethods which takes a string (or string array) of which HTTP methods are allowed. The AllowAnyHeader could be replaced with WithHeaders which takes a string (or string array) of which HTTP headers (not default) are allowed. Content-type could be one of these.
